Property.value: SELECT FIELD_DOMAIN_ID, FIELD_DOMAIN_ID FROM FWK_FIELD_DOMAIN WHERE APPROVAL_YN='Y' ORDER BY 1
select message_id, message_name, org_id from fwk_message where header_yn='Y'

SELECT APP_ID, APP_NAME FROM FWK_APP
SELECT BATCH_APP_ID , BATCH_APP_NAME FROM FWK_BATCH_APP

SELECT MENU_URL, MENU_URL FROM FWK_MENU_APP
SELECT ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME FROM FWK_ROLE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
